refnamediv.refpurpose: Sets the hidden flag for the specified objects.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Sets the hidden flag for the specified objects. When this flag is set, the objects do not appear in t or ls command outputs. The -a option on the ls or t command will force hidden objects to appear in its output.

refsection.title: EXAMPLES
refsection.para: The example shows the use of the hide command to flag a specified object as hidden.
